page.title: 20VILLAGE ATTITUDES
page.content: We asked the villagers to reply anonymously to the question "what are your feelings on Horseheath as a place to live?" "Like all close communities, there are advantages and disadvantages. The people generally are friendly, but there is a little disharmony caused by an overlapping of interests in confined persuits. It is a great pity that the school closed, and instead of three pubs there is now only one." "A very friendly atmosphere_ good mix of people.Now there is a bypass young families are moving in." "we like it" "great""quiet & friendly" "it lacks facilities for the young and the oversixties""too quiet, untidy" "Newcomers act snobbish""Young locals had to move out as strangers bought cottages at exhorbitant prices, these people have no interest in the place"
